watches.name: Classic Chronograph
watches.description: A timeless piece that combines elegance with precision engineering. This watch was a gift for my 30th birthday.

watches.name: Diver's Professional
watches.description: Water-resistant up to 300m, this watch accompanies me on all my aquatic adventures.

watches.name: Vintage Leather
watches.description: A vintage-inspired watch with genuine leather strap, perfect for formal occasions.

shirts.name: Silk Dress Shirt
shirts.description: Handcrafted Italian silk shirt with mother-of-pearl buttons. My go-to for important meetings.

shirts.name: Denim Western
shirts.description: Vintage denim shirt with western detailing. Found at a thrift store in perfect condition.

shirts.name: Linen Camp Collar
shirts.description: Breathable linen shirt perfect for summer evenings. The embroidery was done by hand.

perfumes.name: Terre d'Hermès
perfumes.description: A woody, earthy fragrance with citrus top notes. My signature scent for over 5 years.

perfumes.name: Bleu de Chanel
perfumes.description: A fresh yet profound fragrance with notes of citrus, mint and sandalwood.

perfumes.name: Sauvage
perfumes.description: A bold, fresh fragrance with bergamot and ambroxan notes. Perfect for evenings out.
